properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 1:27PM CST until February 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a Flood
Warning for the following areas in Texas...

Chambers Creek Near Rice Affecting Navarro County
Trinity River At Trinidad Affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties

The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Trinity River At Trinidad.
* from late Thursday night to Sunday morning...Or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 0100 PM Wednesday the stage was 25.98 feet.
* Flood stage is 33.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river should rise above flood stage by Friday after
midnight and continue to rise to a crest near 34 feet by Friday
evening. The river should fall below flood stage by Saturday
evening.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Stay tuned to NOAA All Hazards Radio for the latest river forecasts.
